alert.note: Alert for Fremont (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 12 at 9:59PM CDT until April 13 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT FOR EASTERN FREMONT...MONTGOMERY AND PAGE COUNTIES... At 958 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles northwest of Greenfield to 9 miles northwest of Lake Icaria to 6 miles northwest of Clarinda, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Red Oak, Clarinda, Shenandoah, Villisca, Hamburg, Essex, Stanton, Farragut, Elliott, Riverton, Coin, Braddyville, College Springs, Shambaugh, Grant, Yorktown, Imogene, Northboro, Coburg and Blanchard. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
